messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
How are Magic points replenished?
One-fifth of the investigator's POW
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to a spell caster's hit points when they spend Magic points?
They are deducted directly from hit points
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to a spell caster's hit points when they run out of Magic points?
They are deducted directly from hit points
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do spell casters spend Magic points?
With the will of the owner
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the body if hit points are lost?
physical damage in a form chosen by the Keeper
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the spell caster when they sacrifice Magic points?
may leave sensations of pleasure mingled with regret, a numbness of the soul
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How is the loss of Magic points compared to the loss of POW?
Involuntary loss of 10 POW would be a stronger sensation than losing the same amount of Magic points
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to Magic points when they reach zero?
the investigator deducts further Magic point loss from hit points
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the spell caster's energy if Magic points reach zero?
The investigator deducts further Magic point loss from hit points.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How do Magic points regenerate?
Magic points return at one Magic point per hour (two Magic points per hour for those with POW over 100, etc.).
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How is the loss of Magic points compared to POW loss?
Involuntary loss of 10 POW would be a stronger sensation than that of losing the same amount of Magic points.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can Magic points regenerate to a value above one-fifth of the character's POW?
No, the number of Magic points cannot regenerate to a value above one-fifth of the character’s POW.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the maximum amount of Magic points that can regenerate?
one-fifth of the character’s POW
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can Magic points regenerate to a value above one-fifth of the character’s POW?
No, cannot regenerate to a value above one-fifth of the character’s POW
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How are Magic points lost, in relation to hit points?
as hit points are healed
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can healing of hit points and regeneration of Magic points occur at the same time?
Yes, can occur concurrently
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should a Keeper do after an investigator conducts an initial reading of a book?
The Keeper will indicate the presence and summarize each of the spells in a sentence or two, assuming the book contains spells.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should a Keeper avoid doing when indicating a spell's presence?
The Keeper should not use the rulebook name of a spell.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What might a Keeper offer instead of a rulebook name for a spell like 'Summon Byakhee'?
A description like 'broughte forth a Great Winged Beast from ye void which did sore crowde my place of busyness'.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where can a Keeper find suggestions for alternative names for spells?
Chapter 12: The Grimoire.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is not recommended to use when referring to a spell?
The name of a spell.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is usually required for an investigator to learn a spell?
At least an initial reading of the book.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How long does learning a spell typically take?
2D6 weeks, but at the Keeper's discretion.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can a roll be called for when learning a spell?
Yes, but the Keeper may choose to grant automatic success, depending on the scenario.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How long can it take to learn a Mythos spell?
hours, days, weeks, or months
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who determines the length of time to learn a Mythos spell?
The Keeper at the Keeper’s discretion
